text:
Today we laid my grandma to rest.

I could hear her say my 'one and only son!' As I paid tribute.

That's what drove me to tears. Not her death,she was old and tired. It's the fact that I won't hear her express her pride again.

Guys, cherish your family.

author: Still Dill
text:
Biggest lesson I've learned about love is that pouring yourself into loving someone doesn't guarantee or warrant reciprocation. 

We don't always get what we give. Many times, it's only what they believe we deserve. 

Even then, you have the job of demanding better.

author: Still Dill
Still Dill

Be thankful for the lessons you have learned, purpose to do better and use your experience to create the best life you have lived. 

Peace. Love. Prosperity
